tetrahedra forms two kinds of channels. In the lattice, there
are three kinds of Ba lattice sites. There are two lattice sites,
Ba(1) and Ba(3), which occupy completely in channel 2.
Channel 1 is occupied by the Ba(2) lattice site, which consists
of a six-membered ring formed by six Al/SiO
Ba(1) lattice site in channel 2 and Ba(1) or Ba(3) lattice sites
in channel 1 can be connected by either the Al/SiO
